Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 14, 2024

Introduction

Ascend ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our timeboxing and productivity application.

Information We Collect

When you use Ascend, we may collect:

  • Account Information: Email address and name when you create an account
  • Task Data: Tasks, schedule blocks, and notes you create within the app
  • Google Calendar Data: If you choose to connect Google Calendar, we access your calendar events to display and sync with your schedule
  • Usage Data: How you interact with the app to improve our services

How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

  • Provide and maintain the Ascend service
  • Sync your tasks and schedule across devices
  • Display and create Google Calendar events (with your permission)
  • Improve and personalize your experience

Google Calendar Integration

When you connect your Google Calendar:

  • We only access calendar data necessary to display and create events
  • We do not share your calendar data with third parties
  • You can disconnect Google Calendar at any time in Settings
  • We use Google's OAuth 2.0 for secure authentication

Data Storage

Your data is stored securely using Supabase, which provides enterprise-grade security and encryption. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Delete your account and all associated data
  • Disconnect third-party integrations at any time
  • Export your data

Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: privacy@ascend.app
